data.fullContent: Everyone expectantly awaited for the great singer to arrive on stage, however time continued to pass without her entrance. Backstage, the singer anxiously massaged her throat and drank water, but could not make a sound! Eventually, she had to have her manager go on stage and cancel the concert. All were disappointed.
data.answer: 每个人都在期待着这位伟大的歌手上台，然而时间过得很慢，她还没有出场。在后台，歌手焦急地按摩她的喉咙，喝水，却不能发出声音!最后，她不得不让她的经纪人上台，取消音乐会。大家都很失望。
